ygData.subject: RE: Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: yes and since the weapon does not have any thing that requires CHARGES I disregarded it as a typo/ something that is no installed at this time... there for not
ygData.messageBody:
yes and since the weapon does not have any thing that requires CHARGES I
disregarded it as a typo/ something that is no installed at this time...
there for not important!

The cleanes effect is just like the Tommy effect that it is based off your
dex and has UNLIMITED 'charges'. As of right now there is no need to
'recharge' the SSoL.

Sorry. Try using the weapon before you try to smack on someone.

Jaxim



>From: Ralph Carothers <CarothersR@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
>Date: Mon, 13 Sep 1999 12:08:23 -0400
>
>yes, did u bother to read what he says ON the quest as you do it and get
>the
>SSOL?
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: I. G [mailto:shadowtg1@...]
>Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 11:39 AM
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
>
>
>From: "I. G" <shadowtg1@...>
>
>charges??? Hmmm odd.. I know for a fact that my SSoL has gone of a TON. As
>for cleanes... it removes poison and disease from ya ... sometimes it take
>a
>
>couple of cleanes to remove them though.
>
>
>Jaxim
>
>
> >From: "Anne Falbo-Ortiz" <topaaz_ladyjay@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
> >Date: Mon, 13 Sep 1999 11:16:49 EDT
> >
> >From: "Anne Falbo-Ortiz" <topaaz_ladyjay@...>
> >
> >Clerics have a hard time doing the quest? LOL i am a human cleric and
>had
> >no troule doing said quest, in fact it was one of the easier ones i have
> >done. Now for my question, what exactly does clense do? I was under the
> >impression that it took of negitive effects on the player, tho it always
> >seems to clense me when i dont need it, and there are only 30 charges on
> >it.
> > I have no clue how to get it recharged. I am a lvl 24 cleric on
>Xegony,
> >and am now using a screaming mace which i perfer, the SSoL was nice,
>fast,
> >and consistant in the amount of damg it did, but the effect was wasted on
> >my
> >toon as i never seem to get many neg effects on me. Suffice it to say I
> >gave my SSoL to a noobie that was begging, LOL he loved it and i was
>happy
> >to help, as far as what it is worth, i have no clue as i would pay
>nothing
> >over 20p for it and thats going above the value to me. It's prob worth
> >alot
> >to ppl who want them badly and less to others that don't. just INHO,
>stay
> >safe and have fun
> >
> >
> >>From: "Deane, Ben" <BDeane@...>
> >>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
> >>Date: Mon, 13 Sep 1999 08:06:18 -0700
> >>
> >>From: "Deane, Ben" <BDeane@...>
> >>
> >>The SSoL is a funny thing. It is probably worth more than it seems.
> >>Similar
> >>weapons for pure casters (e.g. Water Crystal staff) I've seen selling
>for
> >>100pp+. The SSoL is basically a mediocre weapon, but with a pretty
>useful
> >>effect. Many clerics cannot do the quest (or don't want to spend time
> >>building faction). To them, it may be fairly desirable.
> >>
> >>I traded my first one to a lvl 30 Teir'dal cleric in return for a pair
>of
> >>crested spaulders (AC11, +6sta), and I think I got the better deal. So I
> >>would say: make your way over to East Commons or Nektulos and you may
>get
> >>a
> >>good price.
> >>
> >>Elbeno
> >>16 times blessed by Karana
> >>Bristlebane
> >>
> >> > -----Original Message-----

> >> >
